articles.description: Pokémon Day 2022 sure would be improved with Pokémon Legends: Arceus DLC news
articles.content: The Pokémon Company is hosting a showcase on its YouTube channel this Sunday, February 27the holy occasion known round the world as Pokémon Day. Though the company has yet to detail the specific game… [+1706 chars]
